item.content:
ROBOFIESTA

With the dream of promoting science and technology and vision of inculcating spirit of innovation, Infotsav ABV-IIITM has come up with some of the most exciting challenges under Robo Fiesta-2012. These robotics competitions and challenges endeavor to transform the ordinary students of today into visionary engineers of tomorrow. At the brainstorming platform of Robo Fiesta, you will witness a series full of competitions to bring out the practical applications of knowledge, determination and skills within all. Infotsav 2012 at ABV-IIITM, Gwalior awaits you for your absolute creativity and enthusiasm in the range of challenger from the pure field of robotics to the simple beginner level competition based on basic sciences. All that is required in Robo Fiesta is little bit tickling of your grey cells to think upon the smartest of ideas.
